      Methods in org.fxmisc.richtext with parameters of type NavigationActions.SelectionPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void NavigationActions.end(NavigationActions.SelectionPolicy selectionPolicy)
      Moves the caret to the end of the text.
      default void NavigationActions.lineEnd(NavigationActions.SelectionPolicy selectionPolicy)
      Moves the caret to the end of the current line.
      default void NavigationActions.lineStart(NavigationActions.SelectionPolicy selectionPolicy)
      Moves the caret to the beginning of the current line.
      default void NavigationActions.moveTo(int pos, NavigationActions.SelectionPolicy selectionPolicy)
      Moves the caret to the position indicated by pos.
      default void NavigationActions.nextChar(NavigationActions.SelectionPolicy selectionPolicy)
      Moves the caret forward one char in the text.
      default void NavigationActions.previousChar(NavigationActions.SelectionPolicy selectionPolicy)
      Moves the caret backward one char in the text.
      default void NavigationActions.start(NavigationActions.SelectionPolicy selectionPolicy)
      Moves the caret to the beginning of the text.
      default void NavigationActions.wordBreaksBackwards(int n, NavigationActions.SelectionPolicy selectionPolicy)
      Skips n number of word boundaries backwards.
      default void NavigationActions.wordBreaksForwards(int n, NavigationActions.SelectionPolicy selectionPolicy)
      Skips n number of word boundaries forward.
